comments:

This is actually J2EE team.....   moving

I tried opening the same workspace with a vanilla Eclipse 3.1 and got the same
crashing behavior. WTP is therefore off the hook for this problem.

I think the problem was caused by me accepting an automatic update for the Sun
1.4.2_06 SDK. I think it added some JDK 5 stuff. I uninstalled and reinstalled
the JDK and the crash is gone now.

I'm closing this. You can reopen it if you think the NPE should be corrected.
I haven't seen these exceptions since I switched to the IBm JDK. I am closing this bug.
